title: Experiment
description: Schema for submitting metadata for an assay with 1 or more replicates.
comment: An experiment is a special case of dataset. It includes assay metadata, replicate information and data files.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the experiment.

target.title: Target
target.description: For assays, such as ChIP-seq or RIP-seq, the name of the gene whose expression or product is under investigation for the experiment.

assay_term_name.title: Assay name
assay_term_name.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.

assay_term_id.title: Assay ID
assay_term_id.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology identifier for the assay.

dataset_type.title: Type
dataset_type.comment: Do not need to submit, value is assigned by server.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Protocols or other documents that describe the assay or the results (not data files).

items.title: Document
items.description: A protocol or other document that describes the assay or the results (not data files).
items.comment: See document.json for a list of available identifiers.

items.title: Data file
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.

references.title: References
references.description: The Pubmed identifiers that reference data found in the experiment.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: A Pubmed identifier that references data found in the experiment.

possible_controls.title: Controls
possible_controls.description: Experiments that contain files that can serve as scientific controls for this experiment.

items.title: Control
items.description: An experiment that contains files that can serve as a scientific control for this experiment.
items.comment: See experiment.json for a list of available identifiers. Exact pairing of data files with their controls is done using file relationships.
